>> grad3 = imread('gradient3px.png');
>> grad3
grad3 =

  0  1  2
  0  1  2
  0  1  2

>> imfinfo('gradient3px.png');
>> diary off
>> grad3 = imread('gradient3px.png');
>> grad3
grad3 =

  0  1  2
  0  1  2
  0  1  2
